data.enText: of or relating to a region
the conflict between regional and national interests
data.chText: 地方利益和国家利益的冲突
地方议会 / 选举 / 报纸

word_means: 为某一地区所生产的商品

means: （身体上的）区的，部位的，局部的
为某一地区所生产的商品

tr: related or limited to a particular region

example.tran: 安达卢西亚自治区政府

example.ex: Many people in Minnesota and Tennessee have noticeable regional accents.
example.tran: 明尼苏达州和田纳西州的许多人都有明显的地区口音。

value.def: Regional is used to describe things which relate to a particular area of a country or of the world.

example.ex: The impact of these trends has varied regionally.
example.tran: 这些潮流的影响依区域而不同。
